pageProduct.name: White Glo White Accelerator Blue Light Teeth Whitening System
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

White Glo Accelerator Dentist Blue Light Teeth Whitening gives visible results from day 1 and gives up to 8 shades whiter teeth within 7 days.

Using dentist technology, the blue spectrum helps to activate the White Glo whitening gel to accelerate the removal of stains, yellowing and discolouration. From just the first use, your teeth with start appearing whiter.

Formula developed by White Glo's Head of Dental Research, Dr. Georgios V. Sotiropoulos

Leading Teeth Whitening, Cosmetic and Restorative Dentist - Mosman, Sydney, Australia. 

Within no time you will have a glamorous white smile. 

Product Claims: Visible results from day 1, 8 shades whiter teeth within 7 days.

Boxed Contents: LED Whitening Accelerator Light Unit, Instant-Fit Mouth tray, 50 Applications of Light Activated Whitening Gel, Instruction Manual, Results Monitoring Guide, Batteries.

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

Product contains batteries. Swallowing battery may lead to serious injury or death in as little as 2 hours due to chemical burns and potential perforation of the esophagus. If swallowed, immediately go to a hospital emergency room. Dispose of used batteries immediately. Risk of injury due to fire, explosion or leakage. Do not charge, crush or expose to fire or high temperatures.

CAUTION

Read full instructions inside before first use. This product is not to be consumed. Use by children under 12 years of age or pregnant women is not recommended. People who have braces, colitis, bad gums, excised roots, ulcers, periodontal disease must not use this product. Avoid prolonged contact of the bleaching gel with the gums. If tooth sensitivity or adverse symptoms occur cease use immediately. Keep out of reach of children -- not a toy. Choking hazard and battery danger. Additional warning on base of pack.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

Risk of injury to fire, explosion or leakage. Do not charge, crush or expose to fire or high temperatures.

Ingredients

Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, 9% Carbamide Peroxide, Triethanolamine, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) oil, Bromelain, Papain.

Directions

3 steps to a celebrity white smile with white accelerator. Step 1: Apply whitening gel to the mouth tray. Ensure the mouth tray is mounted to the Blue Light device. (batteries included)Step 2: Put the mouth tray into your mouth, turn on the blue light unit and wait until the light goes off automatically. (10 minutes(. Step 3: Rinse with water and reveal your whiter and brighter smile.
